meta.label: Export .h5 to Onnx
meta.description: Export a Keras .h5 model to ONNX format. Model should have been exported with model.save()

params.name: input_folder_id
params.label: Input folder
params.description: Folder where the h5 model is

params.name: model_path
params.label: Model path
params.description: Name of the h5 model to convert

params.name: output_folder_id
params.label: Output folder (optional)
params.description: Folder where the onnx model will be stored

params.name: output_model_path
params.label: Output model path
params.description: Path where the onnx model will be stored

params.name: overwrite_output_model
params.label: Overwrite output model
params.description: Overwrite output model if path exists

params.name: show_batch_size
params.label: Fixed batch size
params.description: Use if your runtime does not support dynamic shape

params.name: float_32
params.label: Force input/output to Float (32 bits)
params.description: Uncheck if your runtime supports Double (64 bits)
